intro: Hibbertia hermanniifolia subsp. recondita, commonly known as the narrow-leafed hibbertia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. Hibbertia hermanniifolia subsp. recondita is a shrub that thrives in full sun and is adapted to withstand drought conditions.
